metadata.description: Rumor templates catalog for NPC gossip and information sharing

notes.common: 10-20 rarityWeight (bandit activity, plague, missing person, local gossip)
notes.uncommon: 25-40 rarityWeight (dragon sighting, haunted ruins, treasure, political scandal)
notes.rare: 45-70 rarityWeight (undead rising, lost artifacts, ancient prophecy, forgotten gods)

notes: Rumors are shared by NPCs based on their knowledge and social class
High reliability rumors often lead to quests; Low reliability may be false

danger_warnings.name: BanditActivity
danger_warnings.text: Bandits have been raiding caravans on the road to {location}.

danger_warnings.name: PlagueOutbreak
danger_warnings.text: A strange sickness is spreading through {location}.

danger_warnings.name: MonsterAttacks
danger_warnings.text: Travelers have been attacked by {monster} near {location}.

monster_sightings.name: DragonSighting
monster_sightings.text: They say a {color} dragon was spotted near {location} last week.

monster_sightings.name: GiantFootprints
monster_sightings.text: Enormous footprints were found in the hills near {location}.

monster_sightings.name: SeaSerpent
monster_sightings.text: Sailors claim to have seen a massive serpent off the coast.

treasure_legends.name: TreasureHoard
treasure_legends.text: Legend speaks of a vast treasure hidden in {location}.

treasure_legends.name: LostArtifact
treasure_legends.text: The {artifact_name} was lost centuries ago in {location}.

treasure_legends.name: CursedGold
treasure_legends.text: They found gold in {location}, but all who touched it died.

supernatural_events.name: HauntedRuins
supernatural_events.text: I heard the old {location} is haunted by restless spirits.

supernatural_events.name: GhostAppearance
supernatural_events.text: People have seen a ghostly figure wandering near {location} at night.

supernatural_events.name: UndeadRising
supernatural_events.text: The dead don't stay buried in the cemetery at {location}.

political_intrigue.name: NobleScandal
political_intrigue.text: Rumor has it that Lord {name} is involved in dark dealings.

political_intrigue.name: SuccessionCrisis
political_intrigue.text: The king is dying, and heirs are already fighting for the throne.

political_intrigue.name: TaxRebellion
political_intrigue.text: Villagers in {location} refuse to pay the lord's taxes.

quest_hooks.name: StrangeLights
quest_hooks.text: Mysterious lights appear in the sky over {location} each night.

quest_hooks.name: CryingChild
quest_hooks.text: Locals hear a child crying in {location}, but no one lives there.

ancient_lore.name: AncientProphecy
ancient_lore.text: The old texts speak of a {hero_type} who will save us all.

ancient_lore.name: ForgottenGods
ancient_lore.text: The old gods are waking. Their temples stir with power.

local_gossip.name: MerchantPrices
local_gossip.text: The merchant in town is cheating customers with false weights.

local_gossip.name: SecretAffair
local_gossip.text: {name} has been sneaking around with {name2} after dark.

local_gossip.name: TavernFight
local_gossip.text: There was a big brawl at the tavern last night over a card game.
